message: This offer decreases by inflation rates in subsequent rounds.
You're starting strong, but I'm not giving up yet!
Considering inflation, I've adjusted my offer accordingly.
You're getting desperate, I can smell it!
Equal division seems fair considering the decreasing value of money due to inflation.
You think equal division is fair? I'm not buying it!
I propose a slight imbalance in favor of efficiency, given the diminishing value of money.
You're getting greedy, Alice! I'm not going to let you walk all over me!
I've tried to balance fairness with practicality. Perhaps, we can find common ground here.
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm not budging!
I'm willing to concede slightly more to ensure a positive outcome. Let's aim for mutual benefit.
It's now or never, Alice. Take it or leave it!
